answers.answer: I went through that with my last one but like 2 or 3wks before his due date they found protein in my urine and I had to be induced at 39wks exactly so this time around they're testing my urine early (I'm only 13wks 6days 14wks tomorrow :))and I have to turn mine in tomorrow too hopefully we both get good news good luck and congrats on your baby boy
That's what's most important what's best for baby. Wish you well dear!
Thanks ladies. Trying to just put it in God's hands and not stress.
UPDATE: Got my results back and everything is good, no preeclampsia!!!! Still have to stay on bed rest and keep my appointments but everything is looking good, Thank God!!!!

question: I am 35 weeks today and had my weekly check-up and my BP was going wonky like always. It will be higher than they want it and they will make me lay on my left side for like 5 mins and it will be great when they recheck it. Well today they decided to put me on strict bed rest and have me do a 24hr urine collection. I have to drop it off tomorrow and then they will let me know tomorrow around 4 what the results are and where we go from there. They said if they don't like the results we may have to start talking induction and I really don't want to have to go that route but if it's what's best for my Little Man then I guess I will have my baby before his due date.
title: Drs Appointment and bed rest
